Class IntArrayMethods

  • java.lang.Object
    • IntArrayMethods

  • public class IntArrayMethods
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class will contain static methods for use with integer arrays. Created by rsm on 10/18/19

      • max

        public static int max(int[] inputArray,
                      int startIndex,
                      int endIndex)
        Finds the maximum value in the portion of the input array starting at startIndex and stopping before endIndex.
        Parameters:
        inputArray - the array from which to find a max
        startIndex - the first index to check (elements at preceding indexes won't be considered)
        endIndex - the index before which to stop checking (elements at and after this index won't be considered)
        Returns:
        the maximum value in inputArray from startIndex to endIndex (inclusive for startIndex, exclusive for endIndex)

      • max

        public static int max(int[] inputArray)
        Finds the maximum value in the input array
        Parameters:
        inputArray - the array from which to find the max
        Returns:
        the maximum value in the inputArray

                      int startIndex,
                      int endIndex)
        Finds the minimum value in the portion of the input array starting at startIndex and stopping before endIndex.
        Parameters:
        inputArray - the array from which to find a min
        startIndex - the first index to check (elements at preceding indexes won't be considered)
        endIndex - the index before which to stop checking (elements at and after this index won't be considered)
        Returns:
        the minimum value in inputArray from startIndex to endIndex (inclusive for startIndex, exclusive for endIndex)
